channel.title: Aislerocket on Blind3y3Design
channel.description: Recent content in Aislerocket on Blind3y3Design

item.title: Gladiator GarageWorks Sale Page
item.description: The gladiator sale page takes data from a JSON file and transforms it in to a massive listing of all the products on sale.

item.title: Every garage deserves a Gladiator
item.description: A large portion of the work we do is creating maintaining and updating content on client sites like this one. Personal responsibilities can be anything from updating a JSON file to pull new ads or putting a product feed on a page, to creating completely new and custom pages for a specific product, event, or promotion.

item.title: Working with Cookmore
item.description: During my time at Aisle Rocket Studios I have had the immense pleasure of working on the site Cookmore.com. Cookmore is a community based cooking site. Regular people, as well as professional chefs can post recipes on the site.

item.title: Inspirational Blogging
item.description: The Kenmore Ispiration Blog is a community site that collects posts from across the web and combines them with posts by Kenmore and Cookmore. The blog is a community where people can share, post, and learn about all things Kenmore related. Inspiration is build on a highly customized WordPress installation that is continually being built and improved upon. We recently set up new pages for contests like the “Couponista” challenge. This page followed 3 bloggers in their competition to be the greatest couponer.

item.title: Shipping Something Small
item.description: The Small Parcel page on Kenco was a unique project when I got to work on it. It was my first experience usning the ExpressionEngine CMS. This page is build by creating a page template and once the templace is set and attached to a page we begin loading content on to it.

item.title: For the Craftsman in You
item.description: A large portion of the work we do is creating maintaining and updating content on client sites like this one. Personal responsibilities can be anything from updating a JSON file to pull new ads or putting a product feed on a page, to creating completely new and custom pages for a specific product, event, or promotion.

item.description: A large portion of the work we do is creating maintaining and updating content on client sites like this one. Personal responsibilities can be anything from updating a JSON file to pull new ads or putting a product feed on a page, to creating completely new and custom pages for a specific product, event, or promotion.

item.title: Brand Names at Outlet Prices
item.description: Most of the work done was largely edits to the CSS files that control the look of the site. We also edited and moved some of the HTML structure in order to better the document flow and user experience. We recently Added a pop up modal to the homepage which uses an ajax request and API call to send and receive information from another web server. We solved some issues with IE8 by using the XMLHttpRequest function for IE.
